EUCLIDEAN RINGS /W ARC
rings 1 - 4 adjust euclidean fill [length , phase offset]
outputs: TR 1-4 
1: next step
2: reset/sync of all rings to 0
3: on/off length config mode
3: on/off phase offset config mode

#1
ARC.STP

#2
ARC.RST

#3
EVERY 2: ARC.MO 4
OTHER: ARC.MO 0

#4
EVERY 2: ARC.MO 5
OTHER: ARC.MO 0

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M

#I
ARC.MO 0
ARC.SYN 1

#P
